actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the disposing of untreated waste on tracks by the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Rail Passenger Service Act to repeal an exemption from specified communicable disease control requirements of the Public Health Service Act for waste disposal from railroads operating in intercity rail passenger service.

titles.title: To prohibit the disposing of untreated waste on tracks by the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.
